attributes.review: Showed a video of boots exploring Dora’s mysterious cave as soon as I came to the home screen.
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: The app is infested with bug issues. Glitching is way too frequent. Also the information and resources provided on this app are mundane. This app is unnecessary.
attributes.title: Glitches, bug issues, and overall unnecessary

attributes.title: Carrot

attributes.review: Literally took 43 hours to download... then kept crashing and eventually destroyed my brand new iphone. So now i had to get a new iphone because apple doesnt cover “damage by trump app” like rediculous right? Save ur money time and life by never using this app ever.
attributes.title: Honestly garbage app

attributes.review: this is the worst app ever i hate this app it should be removed from the app store it’s a racist app i hate it
attributes.title: worst app

attributes.review: so i download the app to see if those people were wrong about trump being homophobic, racist, sexist, etc. and i wanted to see for myself. the app was kinda iffy and first and took a few closing and opening to work. when i got it to work it’s asked for MY LOCATION!?! like why you tryin to spy on me it’s not like the NSA already does that. I decline and then the page is filled with oranges and upside down bibles. ugh i can’t believe it 🙄. this app took so long to download that i couldn’t take my pet worm on a walk 🐛. it was such a nice day out too. within the minute of me decking to share my location a gust of wind hot my window. me and my pet worm were shaken up. in the distance we see a shadowy tree looking thing show up. I couldn’t believe it. it was our president right before my very eyes 👁👄👁. it was the cheetoh himself with an orchid of orange trees behind him. it’s kind of a hazy memory but i heard them chanting something about 2020. him and his fugly lookin cheetoh dust and all stood right there glaring at my pet worm.  he proceed to step closer and took a branch off one of the trees 🌲 and STABBED MY PRECIOUS PET WORM. i was absolutely raged. they had the audacity to hurt my pet worm Wiggles. they started slurring their words but i could hear something about screw  “All worms matter”. I had enough and raced to my phone and purged the app from the screen. the cheetoh and the orchid of oranges vanished from my sight and never to bother me again. i’m left alone with my dead pet worm. grieving and traumatized over Wiggles. fly high buddy i’ll see you on the other side. 🥺😭
attributes.title: no, absolutely not

attributes.review: asked for my location and i don't like giving that away 😔 why do you need my location mr trump invading my privacy plz respect peoples info thanks
attributes.title: stalking app

attributes.review: I have been such a loyal supporter of Mr. Donald J. Trump's for so long. However, this app has caused me so many problems I do not even know where to begin. It makes my phone extremely slow. I have deleted it and re-downloaded it multiple times yet everytime I re-download it makes my phone as slow as a turtle! Also, when I try to open it, my phone crashes! I have to turn my phone completely off and turn it back on again for my phone to even start working properly. Since downloading my phone has been extremely glitchy. Very disappointed to say the least.
attributes.title: Disappointed Conservative😔🇺🇸❤️🤍💙

attributes.review: IT GAVE ME BUGS! real life bugs
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: I open the app and “bam” a cheeto like image pops up at first I was confused but I finally came to realize that what I was looking at was the presidents deformed, tiny penis right up close, as soon as I saw this I ran to my closet and grabbed the bleach, next thing I know the bleach is on my eyes and i’m in excruciating pain, (I had outed the bleach into my eyes to cleanse my eyes from the profanity I just witnessed) I was then rushed to the hospital and am now blind, but at least I will never see that cheeto puff penis again, thanks trump for making me bleach my eye balls
